tool_description: Integrates external factors like economic indicators, weather, holidays, and promotions with sales data to identify correlations and improve forecast accuracy.

external_factors.description: Names of external factors to analyze

factor_data.description: External factor data values corresponding to sales periods

lag_periods.description: Time lags to test for delayed effects

error_messages: Data length mismatch: sales_data and factor_data must have the same length
Invalid factor names: External factor names cannot be empty strings
Correlation threshold out of range: Must be between 0 and 1
Invalid lag periods: All lag values must be non-negative integers
usage: Provide sales_data, external_factors names, and corresponding factor_data. Set correlation_threshold and lag_periods for analysis depth.

correlation_scores.description: Correlation coefficients for each significant factor

optimal_lags.description: Optimal time lags for each significant factor

impact_assessment.description: Summary of external factor impacts on demand
